posts.post_content:
Guys.............I have this t201 Cicotte/Thoney card for sale for $SOLD delivered. I would grade the card 'Good' with some creasing and rounded corners. Payment via Paypal 'gift' or 'money owed' preferred, but will also accept personal check/money order. Please PM or email me at [url]mattpienta@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve or with questions. Thanks..........Matt

SOLD...
